release-notes.release-note: Initial release. Installing this plugin will give you access to the steps listed below. - Login - Logout - Push Product and API Definitions to Drafts - Deploy Product and API Definitions - Smoke Test
Renamed Steps, API Product Definition, and templates for easier comprehension.
Removed the 'type' property from 'Login' step. Error handling now properly catches errors.
Support property file encryption. Added Replace Product in a Catalog step. Updated Set Configuration Variable step to not add extra spaces.
